htmlform.formDescription: Admission into a clinic for a pregnant woman to give birth

obs.answerLabel: Abortion due to Gender based Violence

obs.answerLabels: C - Counselled but declined HIV testing, T - Counselled and tested but didn't receive results, TR - Counselled tested and results given - Client tested HIV - in maternity, TRR - Counselled tested and results given - Client tested HIV + in maternity, TRR+ - Client was originally negative but sero-converted at this test, TRK - New ANC clients with Known HIV- status, TRRK - New ANC clients with Known HIV+ status

C - Counselled but declined HIV testing, T - Counselled and tested but didn't receive results, TR - Counselled tested and results given - Client tested HIV - in maternity, TRR - Counselled tested and results given - Client tested HIV + in maternity, TRR+ - Client was originally negative but sero-converted at this test, TRK - New ANC clients with Known HIV- status, TRRK - New ANC clients with Known HIV+ status
Spontaneous Vaginal Delivery/Extraction,Cesarean Section,Breech Delivery,Asisted Delivery,Manual Vacuum Aspiration,Dilation and Curettage (D & C),Laparatomy,Hysterectomy,Other
SS - If baby breathes after Stimulation/and or Suction procedure, BM - If baby breathes after bag and mask prodecure, BMD - If baby dies after bag and mask procedure
EBF-Exclusive Breast Feeding, RP-Replacement feeding,MF-Mixed feeding

obs.answerLabel: 3. IUD as part of post abortion care
4. Implant as part of post abortion care
5. Oral pills as part of post abortion care
6. Depo as part of post abortion care

obs.answerLabels: D - Woman discharged alive,DD- Woman died,R - If the woman ran away or left before being discharged,T- Woman transferred to another facility,DF - Woman discharged alive with fistula,DDF - Woman died with fistula,RF- Woman ran away with fistula,TF - Woman transferred with fistula
MSB - Macerated still birth,FSB - Fresh still birth,NND - Immediate neonatal death (Death within 24 hours),AL - Alive baby,BDF - Baby born with defect
